name: Stickman Fight - Badlandz/Battle Royale
description:
Save the badlandz, destroy pilgrim and his symbiote army.

It's been 10 years since the stick world went to chaos due to catastrophic disasters caused by the zombie outbreak. They could not rebuild and it delved into a period of chaotic regression they call their new world The Badlandz. But darkness is coming, A kind of evil we've never seen.

GAME FEATURES
-Shoot all the deranged cultists
-Destroy demonic nests
-Save Survivors
-Collect Resources
-Defend your village, Build and Craft Traps, Turrets and Artillery
-More features coming
-Brawl and fight till the end

Welcome to the new World of the Badlandz!
Shoot arrows, crossbows in Battle Royale Game
Draw your sword Ready, Stick, Fight em all in epic battles.
Become the top stickman, be the last supreme man standing
Your mission is to fight every stickman you see.
Kill other players, Be the last stick man standing and get the orb in this stickman fight game.
Easy to play, Fun and Super addictive.

FEATURES:
-Stunning graphics
-Sweet Gameplay and Animations
-Color stickman rpg
-Nice Sounds
-Multiplayer Feel
-Killing games
-No Guns
-Kill Zombiez
-Craft defenses
-Build and Defend village
-Epic Stick game
-Amazing graphics
-Fighting Sword game
-Brawl with swords, arrows, daggers, knives and become stars

Download Stickman Fight BadlandZ Today and destroy the evil.
Keep in touch with us if you like Stickman Fight.
The best stickman fight mobile game
